name: Keep it Ticking
description:
Alright, here's the mission briefing:

1. Infiltrate the Evil Hideout.
2. Steal all the gadgets.
3. Collect 5 secret codes to defuse the bomb.
4. Which explodes in 10 seconds???
5. Time travel!

We made a platformer where you go back in time over and over to save yourself from being exploded. It went about as well as you could expect. Let's hope we managed to pack some good fun in it, on top of all the bugs!

⦁ WASD to move
⦁ LMB to shoot (but you need to find a gun first)
⦁ RMB to jump back in time (and space, cause reasons)
⦁ Space to jump

Disclaimer: The official recommended way to play this game is to clone yourself at least a 100 times and jump around like a monkey.
